00060 /*
00061  * Read the file.
00062  */
00063 bool FusionCHPMultiDataData::Read()
00064 {
00065         CHPMultiDataFileReader reader;
00066         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00067         try
00068         {
00069                 reader.Read(chpData);
00070                 return true;
00071         }
00072         catch(...)
00073         {
00074                 return false;
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Convert to the CHP pointer.
00080  */
00081 FusionCHPMultiDataData * FusionCHPMultiDataData::FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip)
00082 {
00083         if (chip != NULL && chip->GetObjectName() == ObjectName)
00084                 return (FusionCHPMultiDataData *)chip;
00085         return NULL;
00086 }
00087 
00088 AffymetrixGuidType FusionCHPMultiDataData::GetObjectName()
00089 {
00090         return ObjectName;
00091 }
